code: import{CHANGE_LAYOUT,CHANGE_LAYOUT_WIDTH,CHANGE_SIDEBAR_THEME,CHANGE_SIDEBAR_TYPE,CHANGE_TOPBAR_THEME,TOGGLE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,SHOW_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,CHANGE_PRELOADER,HIDE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR}from"./actionTypes";export var changeLayout=function changeLayout(layout){return{type:CHANGE_LAYOUT,payload:layout};};export var changePreloader=function changePreloader(layout){return{type:CHANGE_PRELOADER,payload:layout};};export var changeLayoutWidth=function changeLayoutWidth(width,layoutType){return{type:CHANGE_LAYOUT_WIDTH,payload:{width:width,layoutType:layoutType}};};export var changeSidebarTheme=function changeSidebarTheme(theme,layoutType){return{type:CHANGE_SIDEBAR_THEME,payload:{theme:theme,layoutType:layoutType}};};export var changeSidebarType=function changeSidebarType(sidebarType,isMobile){return{type:CHANGE_SIDEBAR_TYPE,payload:{sidebarType:sidebarType,isMobile:isMobile}};};export var changeTopbarTheme=function changeTopbarTheme(topbarTheme){return{type:CHANGE_TOPBAR_THEME,payload:topbarTheme};};export var toggleRightSidebar=function toggleRightSidebar(){return{type:TOGGLE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,payload:null};};export var showRightSidebar=function showRightSidebar(){return{type:SHOW_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,payload:null};};export var hideRightSidebar=function hideRightSidebar(){return{type:HIDE_RIGHT_SIDEBAR,payload:null};};
